title: Upcycling of low value end-of-life cathode material into next generation cathode materials
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1408-1417
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00041B, Paper

R. Madge, A. Jarvis, W. Lima da Silva, L. L. Driscoll, P. A. Anderson, P. R. Slater
Low value Mn based spinel from an EOL EV battery is selectively leached and upcycled to higher value next generation cathode materials.
